Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

1. NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS
   ====================

   Keep up to date with Woodbridge Township

1. [![STOW](/images/CivicAlerts/8/STOW-spot.JPG)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=43)

   #### [Senior Transportation of Woodbridge](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=43)

   The Department of Health & Human Services offers reservation-based transportation services to the Township Senior Centers and special events for Senior residents (ages 60 & older) who have no other means of transportation. [Read on... about Senior Transportation of Woodbridge](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=43)
2. [![The club](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=19823)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=292)

   #### [The Club At Woodbridge](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=292)

   The Club at Woodbridge has it all! With workout equipment, pool, sports courts, golf den, hockey den, and so much more! [Read on... about The Club At Woodbridge](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=292)
3. [![avenelartsspotlight Opens in new window](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=9147)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=184)

   The Avenel Performing Arts Center (APAC) is a multi-disciplinary performing arts center located in Avenel, New Jersey. [Read on... about Avenel Performing Arts Center](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=184)

    A comprehensive directory to link senior citizens and their caregivers to programs and services to enhance quality of life and lead healthy lifestyles with aging in place with confidence and dignity. 13. [![hometown hero Opens in new window](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=17)

    #### [Hometown Hero](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=17)

    T. Nulty American Legion Post established the Woodbridge Township Hometown Hero project. The main goal was to respectfully honor all our men and women who are serving or have served their country in a branch of the military. [Read on... about Hometown Hero](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=17)

23. [![Downtown_Woodbridge_app  Opens in new window](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=294)

    Shop. Eat. Enjoy Local. Whether you're looking for the best dining and shopping options or the latest fitness class, Downtown Woodbridge has it all! Come visit Main Street in Woodbridge for anything you need. [Downtown Dollars Available!](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=294)
24. [![Outline for news and announcements](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=24)

    #### [Woodbridge Economic Development Corporation (WEDCO)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=24)

    Working to attract new businesses, as well as support the area’s already established businesses, the Woodbridge Economic Development Corporation (WEDCO) has designed a number of programs to create successful ventures for area entities. [Read on... about Woodbridge Economic Development Corporation (WEDCO)](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=24)
